morphInfos.tenseExplained: it has happened in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself or is done to oneself
morphInfos.caseExplained: they are doing something or something is done to them
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are female or take a feminine form
morphInfos.caseDescription: that is doing something or having something done to them
morphInfos.description: a woman that _has done herself or been done_ good
morphInfos.explanation: an action that was done to or for a female person or thing that is doing something or having something done to them
